about_the_game:
Story

After the Creator has created therianthropes, several 100 years passed away.
Wolfy boy Fito was trapped in the world of board game, and found a creepy cat Kou which has a magic power.

Meet colorful characters with Fito & Kou and work together from getting out of this creepy world.

And YOU are the one who can help them.
Don’t worry.
We can rewind the time any time.

System


This game is a tactical role-playing game that doesn’t have level-up system.
The battle situations will significantly change by the skills and items which you robbed or picked up at the previous stage.

Like a “Shield”, there are items that supports your party by just having in their pockets.
And the other hand, there are items like a “Medicine” that doesn’t heal you until you use it.
Not all but, you can place some items on the ground and get their supports as well.

The blacky cat Kou also will be your item and supports your party.
She has a unique skills, but if the character who holds her is defeated, it is the game over.

All of the characters (including the boss enemies) has their own treasures.
You can steal them from enemies but Fito is the only one who has the stealing skill.
He is too weak to get reach to the boss enemies alone so support him with the other members.
Their story will change by having or not having these specific treasure items.

Other Features:
*Multiple endings
*For quitting the battle scene, the Quick Save is available.
*Skipping and changing the battle animation speed are always there for busy person.
*Unlimited Turn Rewind System.
